name: Sick Bricks
summary: Welcome to Sick City. An outrageous world filled with even crazier characters. Ninjas, Monsters, Aliens, Zombies, and all sorts of other wacky folk inhabit the many neighborhoods in Sick City. But now this once peaceful city is being threatened by the vile Overlord Omega, and it is up to you and the heroic citizens to fight back against his goons to rebuild and restore every corner of the city to its former glory. It’s time for you to get sucked into the Sick Bricks game and battle to save Sick City!
